title: Dutch oven cooking
brief_description: Illustrates the basic principles of fire building and Dutch oven cooking for hikers and campers. Emphasizes the care and precision which must be exercised when sharpening and using axes and knives; demonstrates the correct methods for chopping wood. Describes, step by step, the procedure for making a batch of biscuits including the preparation of the Dutch oven for baking.
